LanguageData.GoTable.label: 军旗
LanguageData.GoTable.description: Go is one of the oldest strategy games, and one of the simplest to build。
LanguageData.GoTable_Blueprint.label: go table (蓝图)
LanguageData.GoTable_Blueprint_Install.label: go table (蓝图)
LanguageData.GoTable_Frame.label: go table (建造中)
LanguageData.GoTable_Frame.description: Go is one of the oldest strategy games, and one of the simplest to build。
LanguageData.ReversiTable.label: 黑白棋
LanguageData.ReversiTable.description: A simple strategy game that involves placing rocks on both sides of your opponent's pieces, and then switching that piece to your color。
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Blueprint.label: reversi table (蓝图)
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Blueprint_Install.label: reversi table (蓝图)
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Frame.label: reversi table (建造中)
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Frame.description: A simple strategy game that involves placing rocks on both sides of your opponent's pieces, and then switching that piece to your color。
LanguageData.CardTable.label: 牌桌
LanguageData.CardTable.description: A table specially made for playing a wide variety of card games. Suitable for 1-4 players。
LanguageData.CardTable_Blueprint.label: card table (蓝图)
LanguageData.CardTable_Blueprint_Install.label: card table (蓝图)
LanguageData.CardTable_Frame.label: card table (建造中)
LanguageData.CardTable_Frame.description: A table specially made for playing a wide variety of card games. Suitable for 1-4 players。
LanguageData.RimColony.label: 边缘殖民地
LanguageData.RimColony.description: RimColony is a game about building and sustaining a colony after crash landing on a rim world. Some roaming trader had a twisted sense of humor bringing this along。
LanguageData.RimColony_Blueprint_Install.label: RimColony (蓝图)
LanguageData.ReadingTable.label: 阅读台
LanguageData.ReadingTable.description: A small table made to be the perfect height for reading. Has a small drawer for holding books。
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Blueprint.label: reading table (蓝图)
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Blueprint_Install.label: reading table (蓝图)
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Frame.label: reading table (建造中)
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Frame.description: A small table made to be the perfect height for reading. Has a small drawer for holding books。
LanguageData.Painting.label: 绘画
LanguageData.Painting.description: A painting. Useful for covering up holes, and quite easy on the eyes。
LanguageData.Painting_Blueprint_Install.label: painting (蓝图)
LanguageData.Easel.label: 画架
LanguageData.Easel.description: An easel equipped for artistic painting。
LanguageData.Easel_Blueprint.label: painting easel (蓝图)
LanguageData.Easel_Blueprint_Install.label: painting easel (蓝图)
LanguageData.Easel_Frame.label: painting easel (建造中)
LanguageData.Easel_Frame.description: An easel equipped for artistic painting。
LanguageData.ArcadeRS.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Rum Swirled
LanguageData.ArcadeRS.description: A game about sailors shipwrecked on an island with plenty of rum, but no shelter。
LanguageData.ArcadeRS_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Rum Swirled (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeMC.label: 虚拟实境游戏：MintCraft
LanguageData.ArcadeMC.description: A game where the entire world can be shaped by the player, who crafts many things out of mint leaves. Don't ask how。
LanguageData.ArcadeMC_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：MintCraft (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeHL.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Halva Life
LanguageData.ArcadeHL.description: In Halva Life the player plays as Gordon, the red hot pastry chef who must reign in his kitchen before it becomes a total nightmare。
LanguageData.ArcadeHL_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Halva Life (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeES.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Elder Scones
LanguageData.ArcadeES.description: "It's just you, a butter knife, and a plate full of week old scones that you must defend from ravenous townspeople..." Was what the box read for this game。
LanguageData.ArcadeES_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Elder Scones (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeBG.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Baguettris
LanguageData.ArcadeBG.description: Oh no! A baguette supply ship didn't close it's hatch correctly! Quickly stack the falling baguettes for loading on to another ship!
LanguageData.ArcadeBG_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Baguettris (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeCB.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Cooking Baba
LanguageData.ArcadeCB.description: Join Hakase Baba in the kitchen as he teaches you legendary cooking techniques. Then play challenge mode and compete for the title of "Best Chef" in the system!
LanguageData.ArcadeCB_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Cooking Baba (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadePS.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Plants Vs. Salamis
LanguageData.ArcadePS.description: A Salami mothership aproaches on an intercept vector; they mean to board you! Armed only with genetically modified super plants, you must grow your defenses and keep the ships cargo safe!
LanguageData.ArcadePS_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Plants Vs. Salamis (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadePK.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Psycho Knots
LanguageData.ArcadePK.description: The artisanal pizzeria championships are back for their 72nd tournament, can you out-bake your way to the top?
LanguageData.ArcadePK_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Psycho Knots (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeSP.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Speltunky
LanguageData.ArcadeSP.description: One day a sinkhole collapses in the middle of your dinkel wheat farm, sending you plummeting into a massive underground cave network. Your only hope for escape is to mine your way out, but danger lurks around every corner。
LanguageData.ArcadeSP_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Speltunky (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeTZ.label: 虚拟实境游戏：The Zimz
LanguageData.ArcadeTZ.description: In The Zimz, you play a game that simulates people and you watch as they sometimes play games that simulate people. Talk about a multiverse..。
LanguageData.ArcadeTZ_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：The Zimz (蓝图)
LanguageData.ArcadeTV.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Trauma Vendor
LanguageData.ArcadeTV.description: It's 14:00, time to drive the truck around and see who needs medical treatment. Just another day on a warring urbworld。
LanguageData.ArcadeTV_Blueprint_Install.label: 虚拟实境游戏：Trauma Vendor (蓝图)
LanguageData.MinifiedPainting.label: 绘画
